description:
Top Criminal Defense In Providence

At Marin and Barrett, Inc., we are fully prepared to help you fight the criminal charges you face to help you obtain the best possible outcome for your serious legal challenge. Our law firm has three offices in Rhode Island, including one in Providence, each offering convenient access to the highest level of advocacy and legal support possible.

Award-Winning Counsel From A Local Attorney

Backed by over 25 years of combined legal experience, attorneys Marin, Barrett, and Parrillo possesses the extensive skills and resources necessary to devise the most effective defense strategy on your behalf. Widely regarded as some of the nation's leading criminal defense attorneys, he has helped thousands of individuals protect their rights and preserve their freedom in the face of some of the most serious criminal charges, and they have received many accolades and awards throughout their careers for their unwavering dedication to helping our clients obtain the justice they seek.

As local attorney, they have developed working relationships with many of the legal professionals in our region, including other lawyers, judges and prosecutors, enabling them to deliver a level of representation unmatched by other legal practices. Our law firm has received many positive reviews from satisfied clients.

Devoted To Your Specific Needs

Delivering personalized counsel tailored to your specific circumstances, we will advise you of your available options so that you can make the best informed decisions about your case. We promise to remain with you during all legal proceedings to offer the ongoing support you deserve.

To begin the process of securing this level of representation from an attorney you can trust, contact Marin and Barrett, Inc., to receive a free initial consultation.
